comment.author: 35687899@N00
comment._content: 350 Lafayette Street (between Bond and Bleecker), opened March 1914. Photo taken from NE corner of Lafayette and Bond streets, looking WSW. NY Times article from March 15 of that year about the new hospital (PDF format) current Google Street View
